overview: Matt Bower is responsible for developing, directing and executing marketing & operations initiatives, including branding, demand generation and CRM/marketing automation programs to achieve growth and revenue objectives for the ClickSafety. Matt has extensive construction industry & online education experience driving top line revenue and profitability through market share, sales & business development optimization, branding, ROI marketing and operational efficiencies. Prior to ClickSafety, Matt held senior Sales, Marketing & Operations positions with The McGraw-Hill Companies, Kaplan Professional and Reed Business Information.
